## Checklist

<!-- Please make sure all applicable items are checked before requesting review. -->

- [ ] PR title follows <type>: short description
e.g. feat: add branch tree graph, fix: handle empty repo on overview

- [ ] New / updated tests were added or existing tests still pass

- [ ] No secrets, tokens, or sensitive data are committed
- [ ] For UI changes: screenshots or recordings are attached
- [ ] For breaking changes: “Breaking Changes” section is filled out
